title: Please help me!
body: My mouse Courser is so small! That along with all the text in game and the sprites for the towers on the minimap all super tiny, I also keep getting a directX error for no reason..

replies.body:
Are you using a 4K monitor?  It's not fully supported, so you may need to scale down to not exceed 1920x1080.  You could also have some messed up config settings, but a config reset might help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
